channel.title: Semi-newb question: Where are RSL scripts?
channel.description:
Hello!
I've been on vacation for about a week, and when I got back I got the newsletter about all the changes...so here's the question: Where are all the RSL scripts, or do you have to have a certain rank to get them, like on Villavu?
Anything else I should know about?
Thanks a bunch! Shadowmoon[br][size=1]Posted at: July 17, 2006, 06:19:29 PM[/size][hr]Actually, I mean SRL. Sorry.

item.title: Semi-newb question: Where are RSL scripts?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Check out the SRL Portal, and leave a join request there. All SRL scripts have been moved there, because this is SRL’s new home.

Read full topic
item.source: Semi-newb question: Where are RSL scripts?
